title: Contact Us
description: Contact the HY-Motion team for support, API inquiries, or partnership opportunities.

seo.title: Contact HY-Motion AI | Support, API & Enterprise Sales
seo.description: Get in touch with the HY-Motion team. We provide support for our text-to-3D motion generator, API access, commercial licensing, and custom model training inquiries.

header.title: Get in Touch with HY-Motion
header.subtitle: Building the future of procedural animation? Whether you have questions about FBX retargeting, API integration, or enterprise licensing, we're here to help.

inquiries.title: Support & Sales
inquiries.description: For technical assistance, bug reports, or inquiries about commercial API limits.
inquiries.responseData: Please email us directly or use the form. We aim to respond within 24-48 business hours.

form.description: Fill out the form below and our team will get back to you shortly.
